reference.shortdesc: The publishtype element indicates whether the book is generally available from the publisher or is restricted in some way.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The value attribute indicates the restrictions, such as beta release, limited availability, or general availability.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The publishtype element is specialized from data. It is defined in the bookmap module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: For this element, the value attribute specifies any restrictions on the availability of the publication.
